<Text: Thomas Mann Prize ("German": Thomas-Mann-Preis) is a literary prize of Germany.>
Triplets:<Thomas Mann Prize
1:
--------------------
Text: Thomas Mann Prize:  In full the title is "Thomas Mann Prize of the city of Lübeck and the Bavarian Academy of Fine Arts".
Triplets:<Thomas Mann Prize
Thomas Mann Prize of the city of Lübeck and the Bavarian Academy of Fine Arts
3:
--------------------
Text: Thomas Mann Prize:  The award is the product of a merger of two prizes in 2010, the Thomas Mann Preis der Hansestadt Lübeck (Thomas Mann Prize Lübeck) and the Großen Literaturpreis (Great Literature Prize) of the Bavarian Academy of Fine Arts.
